Spring Framework
  1. org.springframework.resilience.retry

Uses of Package
org.springframework.resilience.retry

Packages that use org.springframework.resilience.retry
Package
Description
org.springframework.resilience.retry
A retry interceptor arrangement based on core.retry and Reactor.
  • Classes in org.springframework.resilience.retry used by org.springframework.resilience.retry
    Class
    Description
    AbstractRetryInterceptor
    Abstract retry interceptor implementation, adapting a given retry specification to either RetryTemplate or Reactor.
    MethodRetryPredicate
    Predicate for retrying a Throwable from a specific Method.
    MethodRetrySpec
    A specification for retry attempts on a given method, combining common retry characteristics.
